vulnerability.name: USN-4677-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4677-1 fixed a vulnerability in p11-kit. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   David Cook discovered that p11-kit incorrectly handled certain memory  operations. An attacker could use this issue to cause p11-kit to crash,  resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in p11-kit. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
